
Bootstraps the configuration of omni

This will walk you through setting up the initial configuration to use omni, such as setting
up the worktree, format to use when cloning repositories, and setting up initial
organizations.

Usage: omni config bootstrap [OPTIONS]

Options:
  --worktree          Bootstrap the main worktree location
  --repo-path-format  Bootstrap the repository path format
  --organizations     Bootstrap the organizations
  --shell             Bootstrap the shell integration

Source: builtin
